Scottsdale.Udinotti Museum of Figurative Art: The Udinotti Museum of Figurative Art is a non-profit 501 (c) 3 museum located in Paradise Valley, Arizona. The museum was founded by sculptor, painter, printmaker, poet, and gallery owner Agnese Udinotti in 2007. The collection focuses on figurative art from 1500 BCE (Ancient Egyptian) to the present.
